name: You Play As Fump
description:
A short adventure! Made in a lil game jamboree with https://pompasaur.itch.io.

You can play as https://www.bunnyboyresidence.com/YouPlayAsFump/

(Uses music from Yo Noid 2, Plok, and Miitopia)

u shuld also play Pom's game. it's badass: https://pompasaur.itch.io/john-wick-the-game?secret=gMfDmk3aWZKS43u8GK3ij0vmI0
